full_text: Nobody follows me for my takes on mental health, but we can’t separate Amber Heard’s double diagnosis of HPD and BPD from the sexism that traditionally underlines those diagnoses. I can’t imagine a scenario where a man would be so publicly diagnosed with both.

full_text: just because amber heard was diagnosed with bpd (in a single day, during a trial...)  doesn't mean everyone w/ bpd is an abuser. that stigma is grossly harmful & inaccurate. ppl w/ bpd are more likely to harm themselves — 70% of ppl w/ bpd attempt suicide and 10% die by suicide.

full_text:
BPD is a highly stigmatised disorder.

Not everyone with BPD are as bad as Amber Heard.  

Every person experiences BPD differently. 

Not everyone with BPD are violent.

Source:
Self -- living with BPD and about to begin a DBT program for treatment. In a skills group.
